attributes.action: Politely ask Her majesty The Queen to dissolve parliment immediately as we the people no longer have any faith or trust in the present governing body.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Faith and trust no longer exist. Please show your commitment to the raising of quality of life and freedom to be alive without the current corrupted governments.
They no longer have any use, as they no longer have any supporters.
Thankyou

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
